eu.cqse.check.framework.checktest

Class TestCheckContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.checktest.TestTokenElementContext
      • eu.cqse.check.framework.checktest.TestCheckContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICheckContext, ITokenElementContext

    public class TestCheckContext
extends TestTokenElementContext
implements ICheckContext
    The context implementation used during testing. This context can maintain filtered and unfiltered code separate from each other. However, if the filtered and unfiltered content is different, the line numbers of created findings might not be correct because we cannot convert between filtered and unfiltered offsets like normal teamscale. Therefore, line numbers for reported findings might be wrong in the test context depending on which code (filtered or unfiltered) the custom check computes its finding offsets.

      • createFindingForLines

        public void createFindingForLines(java.lang.String message,
                                  int startLine,
                                  int endLine,
                                  ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption view)
        Description copied from interface: ICheckContext
        Creates a finding with the given message from the given start line (inclusive) to the given end line (inclusive). Provide the ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption that was used to get the token stream. If textView is ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption.UNFILTERED_CONTENT and the finding refers to filtered code, then it will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        createFindingForLines in interface ICheckContext

Provide the ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption that was used to get the token stream. If textView is ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption.UNFILTERED_CONTENT and the finding refers to filtered code, then it will be ignored.

      • createFindingForSiblingsInCurrentFile

        public void createFindingForSiblingsInCurrentFile(java.lang.String message,
                                                  java.util.List<OffsetBasedRegion> regions)
        Description copied from interface: ICheckContext
        Creates a finding for each entry in the given List of OffsetBasedRegion with the given message from the given start offsets (inclusive) to the corresponding end offsets (inclusive). Offsets must be based on filtered content (ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption.FILTERED_CONTENT).
        Specified by:
        createFindingForSiblingsInCurrentFile in interface ICheckContext

      • createFindingForSiblings

        public void createFindingForSiblings(java.lang.String message,
                                     CheckTextRegionLocation mainLocation,
                                     java.util.List<CheckTextRegionLocation> siblingLocations)
        Description copied from interface: ICheckContext
        Creates one finding for the given message and main location. Adds the given siblingLocations as siblings to the new finding. The list of sibling locations must not contain the main location. All offsets/line numbers are based on ECodeViewOption.ETextViewOption.UNFILTERED_CONTENT.
        Specified by:
        createFindingForSiblings in interface ICheckContext

        Description copied from interface: ICheckContext
        Returns all values that have been extracted by the phase. This is potentially expensive if a lot of values are expected from a phase. For phases with few expected values, this can be used safely.
